When time seems to freeze, hastily tack on âin that shirtâ or âwhen you make your award-winning meatballsâ or, if you are feeling particularly brave, âwhen we do this.â Resume dancing and pretend you donât feel her eyes on you the rest of the night.

Tell her with your hands shaking.
